

I AM HERE shopping_cart
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = 0;



I AM HERE shopping_cart
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = '1';



I AM HERE shopping_cart
sidebox: 

Explain 
select code
                      from currencies
                      where code = 'USD' LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE shopping_cart
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_id, products_quantity_order_max from products where products_id = '1';



I AM HERE shopping_cart
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_id, products_quantity_mixed from products where products_id='1' limit 1;



I AM HERE shopping_cart
sidebox: 

Explain 
select pa.products_attributes_id
                           from products_attributes pa left join products_options po on pa.options_id = po.products_options_id
                           where pa.products_id = '1' and po.products_options_type != '5' limit 1;



I AM HERE shopping_cart
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
            from sessions
            where sesskey = 'u67a7631nnd2dsdq0sqj8r0qf1';



I AM HERE shopping_cart
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = 0;



I AM HERE shopping_cart
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = '1';
